name: Unfinished Character Controller Demo
description:
It's been too long since I've touched it so I'm uploading. features missing: turning, spherical gravity, a air dash without vertical movement, and more?

controls:

for keyboard: wasd, space, cvbnm, xfghjk. those are move, jump, dive(brake), and dash

for gamepad: left stick, east button, south button, west button. haven't tested it myself.

you build up speed while moving on the ground, affects other stuff as well, resets when not inputting movement. if you jump without moving jump power increases each time. without the inspector or ui telling you your coordinates it might be trickier but you can get back to the area alright i think if you throw yourself off.
